events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your website but I want to return it because it does not fit as expected and I would like a refund.
The customer's request to return the jacket has been categorized as a Refund case based on their mention of refund and return.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund request submitted by the customer for the returned jacket.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you want to return your jacket and request a refund. I’m here to help you with this.
Could you please provide your order number and let us know if the jacket has been used or damaged in any way? This will help us process your refund quickly.
The order number is 123456789. The jacket is brand new, I just tried it on once but it didn’t fit. I haven’t damaged it at all.
Thank you for the details. You can return the jacket within 30 days using our prepaid shipping label. Once we receive the item, we will process the full refund back to your original payment method.
That sounds great, thank you for the clear instructions! I will send the jacket back tomorrow using the label you provide.
I have just emailed you the prepaid return label. Please print it and attach it to your package. Let us know if you need any further assistance during your return.
Following up to check if you have sent the return package for your jacket and if you need any help with the refund process.
Yes, I dropped the return package off at the post office two days ago. Please let me know when the refund is processed.
We have received your returned jacket and processed your refund successfully. The amount should appear on your payment method within 3-5 business days.
We have sent you a short survey to gather feedback on your experience with our returns process. We appreciate your input.
Your refund case has been successfully closed. Thank you for contacting support, and we hope to assist you again in the future.
